tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by improper validation of object prototypes when creating or setting properties that can allow user-controlled inputs to directly impact the `__proto__`, leading to unexpected behaviors. An attacker can pass a crafted payload to modify the global object prototype, enabling potential bypasses in security checks and privilege escalation, depending on the application's logic.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `handsontable` library to the patch version.
